transcript: so acquisition.com I wanted to buy it but marketing.com was also available so marketing.com is 5.6 million acquisition.com was I think listed for like 350 or something like that and so I wrote her an email I've written like four emails in the last like two years and one of them was for this marketing.com 5.6 million I gave all the reasoning for it and I was like but if that feels a little excessive you can go to acquisition.com and she emailed back and she was like the acquisition.com feels a lot more reasonable and so that was my big price anchor
